item.title: chrome download shelf
item.description: Chrome download shelf is the widget shown in the buttom when you initiate a new download. This document summarizes how the download shelf is implemented. It is sketchy on the details. For more information, click on the source code or documentation links. How to inspect chrome browser ui components In short, run chrome with chromium --enable-ui-devtools=1234 and open url chrome://inspect/#native-ui. See also UI DevTools Overview and Chromium Desktop UI Debugging Tools and Tips.
